browser_action.default_title: Structured Data Testing Tool: current URL test

name: Structured Data Test of current URL
description: This extension tests the current URL in browser with Google's Structured Data Testing Tool - Created von Marketingradar.de
content_security_policy: script-src 'self' https://www.googletagmanager.com https://www.googleadservices.com https://www.google.com https://googleads.g.doubleclick.net; object-src 'self'
